resolution.label: CommandInjectionResolution
resolution.description: The full path: %s If you think this is a false positive you can ignore it.

resolution.label: Sanitize this element using OWASP libraries
resolution.description:
This element should be sanitized to avoid Cross-Site Scripting(XSS).
Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks are a type of injection, in which malicious scripts are injected into otherwise benign and trusted web sites.

resolution.label: Ignore this warning
resolution.description:
Our heuristics detected that %s might be vulnerable.

If you think it is a false positive you can ignore it and this warning will no longer appear.
